quote: The flower that blooms in adversity is the most rare and beautiful of all.
author: Mulan

quote: Hakuna Matata! It means no worries for the rest of your days.
author: Timon (The Lion King)

quote: To infinity and beyond!
author: Buzz Lightyear (Toy Story)

quote: The past can hurt. But the way I see it, you can either run from it, or learn from it.
author: Rafiki (The Lion King)

quote: You’ve got a friend in me.
author: Woody (Toy Story)

quote: When you wish upon a star, makes no difference who you are.
author: Jiminy Cricket (Pinocchio)

quote: A dream is a wish your heart makes.
author: Cinderella

quote: Adventure is out there.
author: Carl Fredricksen or Ellie (Up)

quote: Remember, you’re the one who can fill the world with sunshine.
author: Snow White

quote: You’re mad. Bonkers. Off your head. But I’ll tell you a secret… all the best people are.
author: Mad Hatter (Alice in Wonderland)

quote: If you can dream it, you can do it.
author: Walt Disney (quote himself)

quote: All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them.
author: Walt Disney

quote: It’s kind of fun to do the impossible.
author: Walt Disney

quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
author: Walt Disney

quote: Laughter is timeless, imagination has no age, and dreams are forever.
author: Walt Disney

quote: When you believe in a thing, believe in it all the way, implicitly and unquestionably.
author: Walt Disney

quote: Ohana means family. Family means nobody gets left behind or forgotten.
author: Lilo (Lilo & Stitch)

quote: You control your destiny – you don’t need magic to do it.
author: Merida (Brave)

quote: Just keep swimming.
author: Dory (Finding Nemo)

quote: The only way to get what you want in this world is through hard work.
author: Tiana (The Princess and the Frog)

quote: You’re braver than you believe, stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think.
author: Christopher Robin (Winnie the Pooh)

quote: Even miracles take a little time.
author: Fairy Godmother (Cinderella)

quote: Sometimes the right path is not the easiest one.
author: Grandmother Willow (Pocahontas)

quote: A dream is a wish your heart makes.
author: Cinderella

quote: Oh, lurve!
author: Cogsworth (Beauty and the Beast)

quote: I am not a prize to be won.
author: Jasmine (Aladdin)

quote: The very things that hold you down are going to lift you up.
author: Dumbo

quote: I never look back, darling! It distracts from the now.
author: Edna Mode (The Incredibles)

quote: To laugh at yourself is to love yourself.
author: Winnie the Pooh

quote: Fools aren’t born, Pongo. Pretty girls make them in their spare time.
author: Roger (101 Dalmatians)

quote: But why is the rum gone?
author: Jack Sparrow (Pirates of the Caribbean)

quote: I’m not crazy. My reality is just different than yours.
author: Cheshire Cat (Alice in Wonderland)

quote: Mirror, mirror, on the wall, who is the fairest of them all?
author: The Evil Queen (Snow White)

quote: I’m surrounded by idiots.
author: Scar (The Lion King)

quote: You poor, simple fools. Thinking you could defeat me.
author: Maleficent (Sleeping Beauty)

quote: There’s no place like home.
author: Dorothy (Wizard of Oz, but in Disney context)

quote: Love is putting someone else’s needs before yours.
author: Olaf (Frozen)

quote: You’re my greatest adventure.
author: Mr. Incredible (The Incredibles)

quote: To infinity... and beyond!
author: Buzz Lightyear (Toy Story)

quote: All it takes is faith and trust.
author: Peter Pan

quote: I am not afraid… I was born to do this.
author: Moana

quote: Venture outside your comfort zone. The rewards are worth it.
author: Rapunzel (Tangled)

quote: Your identity is your most valuable possession. Protect it.
author: Mr. Incredible (The Incredibles)

quote: Have courage and be kind.
author: Cinderella

quote: Who says ‘If I can't take it with me, I don't want it’?
author: Simba (The Lion King)

quote: I never knew I needed this until it was mine.
author: Elsa (Frozen)

quote: Some people are worth melting for.
author: Olaf (Frozen)

quote: The problem is not the problem. The problem is your attitude about the problem.
author: Jack Sparrow (Pirates of the Caribbean)

quote: You are braver than you believe, stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think.
author: Winnie the Pooh

quote: I would rather die tomorrow than live a hundred years without knowing you.
author: John Smith (Pocahontas)

quote: The only thing predictable about life is its unpredictability.
author: Ratatouille

quote: Today is a good day to try.
author: Quasimodo (The Hunchback of Notre Dame)

quote: Everything you see exists together in a delicate balance.
author: Mufasa (The Lion King)

quote: Our fate lives within us. You only have to be brave enough to see it.
author: Merida (Brave)

quote: The things that make me different are the things that make me.
author: Piglet (Winnie the Pooh)

quote: Only you can control your destiny.
author: Mulan

quote: Giving up is for rookies.
author: Phil (Hercules)

quote: What’s a queen without her king? Well, historically speaking, more powerful.
author: Elsa (Frozen)
